other_tests.findings: Significant heart murmur and chest X-ray revealed cardiomegaly.
other_tests.changes_over_time: At 17 years, showed a large pericardial effusion with severe concentric left ventricular hypertrophy.

other_tests.findings: Thick left ventricular wall thickness, moderate mitral regurgitation, left-to-right shunt across patent foramen ovale, and patent ductus arteriosus.
Compensatory hypertrophy of the left kidney.
Confirmed generalized arterial calcification of infancy (GACI) type 1.
Significant calcification on the descending aorta.
Positive ANA, anti-dsDNA, anti-SM antibodies, and low C4 complement.
